title: Arrest of coup plot suspect ordered
description: TAMPA, Fla. -- A federal judge in Tampa has ordered the arrest of a former Green Beret accused of plotting to invade Venezuela in 2020 after he failed to show up to court for a hearing on whether he should be taken back into custody for violating the conditions of his pretrial release.
content: TAMPA, Fla. -- A federal judge in Tampa has ordered the arrest of a former Green Beret accused of plotting to invade Venezuela in 2020 after he failed to show up to court for a hearing on whether he should be taken back into custody for violating the... [3092 chars]

title: How the United States is preparing a military staging ground near Venezuela
description: Reuters report mentioned that new construction in Puerto Rico and the Virgin Islands pointed to preparations that could enable the US military to carry out operations inside Venezuela
content: The United States military is upgrading a long-abandoned former Cold War naval base in the Caribbean, a Reuters visual investigation has found, suggesting preparations for sustained operations that could help support possible actions inside Venezuela... [9910 chars]

title: Pentagon admits it doesn’t know identities of those killed in Latin American drug interdiction strikes
description: The Pentagon has admitted to Congress that it does not know the identities of at least 61 people killed in U.S. military strikes targeting suspected drug-smuggling vessels near Venezuela and in the Eastern Pacific Ocean. This lack of transparency has sparked bipartisan concerns over the legality and oversight of the campaign, which critics argue amounts to extrajudicial […]
content: The Pentagon has admitted to Congress that it does not know the identities of at least 61 people killed in U.S. military strikes targeting suspected drug-smuggling vessels near Venezuela and in the Eastern Pacific Ocean. This lack of transparency has... [6047 chars]

title: Russia denounces 'excessive' US military force in Caribbean, backs Venezuela
description: Russia has strongly condemned the United States' use of military force in the Caribbean. Moscow stated that these actions violate international law. Russia also reiterated its unwavering support for Venezuela's leadership. This comes as the US intensifies its anti-drug operations in the region. Venezuela's President Maduro has previously accused the US of seeking his removal from power.
content:

title: Trump’s squeeze of Venezuela goes beyond Monroe Doctrine - in ideology, intent and scale, it’s unprecedented
description: A US military buildup in the Caribbean after weeks of naval strikes is both the latest case of intervention in Latin America and uniquely aggressive in key ways.
content:
A massive military buildup in the Caribbean has sparked speculation that the U.S. is now engaged in its latest chapter of direct intervention in Latin America.
For now, at least, President Donald Trump has walked back suggestions that Washington is e... [7852 chars]

title: Former Mariners and Cubs Pitcher Yoervis Medina Dead At 37
description: Yoervis Medina death reported at 37 after a heart attack and car crash in Venezuela the ex Mariners and Cubs pitcher is mourned by teammates and family
content:
Yoervis Medina, the former pitcher for the Seattle Mariners and Chicago Cubs, had died. He was 37.

title: Rusia presenta su nuevo submarino nuclear 'Khabarovsk' mientras refuerza sus contactos con Venezuela ante la presión de EEUU
description: El Kremlin ha confirmado que mantiene conversaciones con Venezuela tras la petición de ayuda de Caracas frente a la presión de Washington. Al mismo tiempo, Moscú ha estrenado un nuevo submarino de propulsión nuclear Khabarovsk, diseñado para transportar el dron submarino con capacidad atómica Poseidón.
content: Rusia lanzó este sábado el nuevo submarino nuclear 'Khabarovsk' en el puerto de Severodvinsk, al norte del país, según anunció el Ministerio de Defensa. El ministro Andrei Belousov aseguró que este crucero lanzamisiles "reforzará la seguridad marítim... [2903 chars]

title: Dos campamentos del ELN en Venezuela fueron desmantelados por la Fuerza Armada sin que haya ningún detenido
description: El gobierno difundió videos de supuestas operaciones exitosas, mientras evita pronunciarse sobre víctimas y omite detalles clave de los enfrentamientos recientes en regiones estratégicas del país
content: El régimen venezolano ha desplegado desde hace unas semanas la propaganda del combate contra campamentos del Ejército de Liberación Nacional (ELN), sin que anuncie detenidos, muertos o heridos. Difunden videos para hacer creíble la versión, como lo h... [4693 chars]

title: Rusia admite contactos con Venezuela para ayudar a Maduro tras los ataques estadounidenses en el Caribe
description: El portavoz de la Presidencia rusa ha afirmado que están "en contacto" con Venezuela por "obligaciones contractuales".
content: Rusia ha admitido tener contactos con Venezuela al ser preguntado por informaciones sobre una eventual solicitud de ayuda del líder de ese país, Nicolás Maduro, al presidente ruso, Vladímir Putin. Tal y como ha asegurado el portavoz de la Presidencia... [2647 chars]
